00015 // Spectrum Declarations
00016 class COREDLL Spectrum {
00017 public:
00018         // Spectrum Public Methods
00019         Spectrum(float v = 0.f) {
00020                 for (int i = 0; i < COLOR_SAMPLES; ++i)
00021                         c[i] = v;
00022         }
00023         Spectrum(float cs[COLOR_SAMPLES]) {
00024                 for (int i = 0; i < COLOR_SAMPLES; ++i)
00025                         c[i] = cs[i];
00026         }
00027         friend ostream &operator<<(ostream &, const Spectrum &);
00028         Spectrum &operator+=(const Spectrum &s2) {
00029                 for (int i = 0; i < COLOR_SAMPLES; ++i)
00030                         c[i] += s2.c[i];
00031                 return *this;
00032         }
00033         Spectrum operator+(const Spectrum &s2) const {
00034                 Spectrum ret = *this;
00035                 for (int i = 0; i < COLOR_SAMPLES; ++i)
00036                         ret.c[i] += s2.c[i];
00037                 return ret;
00038         }
00039         Spectrum operator-(const Spectrum &s2) const {
00040                 Spectrum ret = *this;
00041                 for (int i = 0; i < COLOR_SAMPLES; ++i)
00042                         ret.c[i] -= s2.c[i];
00043                 return ret;
00044         }
00045         Spectrum operator/(const Spectrum &s2) const {
00046                 Spectrum ret = *this;
00047                 for (int i = 0; i < COLOR_SAMPLES; ++i)
00048                         ret.c[i] /= s2.c[i];
00049                 return ret;

00052                 Spectrum ret = *this;
00053                 for (int i = 0; i < COLOR_SAMPLES; ++i)
00054                         ret.c[i] *= sp.c[i];
00055                 return ret;

00059                         c[i] *= sp.c[i];

00063                 Spectrum ret = *this;
00064                 for (int i = 0; i < COLOR_SAMPLES; ++i)
00065                         ret.c[i] *= a;
00066                 return ret;

00069                 for (int i = 0; i < COLOR_SAMPLES; ++i)
00070                         c[i] *= a;
00071                 return *this;
00072         }
00073         friend inline
00074         Spectrum operator*(float a, const Spectrum &s) {
00075                 return s * a;
00076         }
00077         Spectrum operator/(float a) const {
00078                 return *this * (1.f / a);
00079         }
00080         Spectrum &operator/=(float a) {
00081                 float inv = 1.f / a;
00082                 for (int i = 0; i < COLOR_SAMPLES; ++i)
00083                         c[i] *= inv;
00084                 return *this;
00085         }
00086         void AddWeighted(float w, const Spectrum &s) {
00087                 for (int i = 0; i < COLOR_SAMPLES; ++i)
00088                         c[i] += w * s.c[i];
00089         }
00090         bool operator==(const Spectrum &sp) const {
00091                 for (int i = 0; i < COLOR_SAMPLES; ++i)
00092                         if (c[i] != sp.c[i]) return false;
00093                 return true;
00094         }
00095         bool operator!=(const Spectrum &sp) const {
00096                 return !(*this == sp);
00097         }
00098         bool Black() const {
00099                 for (int i = 0; i < COLOR_SAMPLES; ++i)
00100                         if (c[i] != 0.) return false;
00101                 return true;
00102         }
00103         Spectrum Sqrt() const {
00104                 Spectrum ret;
00105                 for (int i = 0; i < COLOR_SAMPLES; ++i)
00106                         ret.c[i] = sqrtf(c[i]);
00107                 return ret;
00108         }
00109         Spectrum Pow(const Spectrum &e) const {
00110                 Spectrum ret;
00111                 for (int i = 0; i < COLOR_SAMPLES; ++i)
00112                         ret.c[i] = c[i] > 0 ? powf(c[i], e.c[i]) : 0.f;
00113                 return ret;
00114         }
00115         Spectrum operator-() const {
00116                 Spectrum ret;
00117                 for (int i = 0; i < COLOR_SAMPLES; ++i)
00118                         ret.c[i] = -c[i];
00119                 return ret;
00120         }
00121         friend Spectrum Exp(const Spectrum &s) {
00122                 Spectrum ret;
00123                 for (int i = 0; i < COLOR_SAMPLES; ++i)
00124                         ret.c[i] = expf(s.c[i]);
00125                 return ret;
00126         }
00127         Spectrum Clamp(float low = 0.f,
00128                        float high = INFINITY) const {
00129                 Spectrum ret;
00130                 for (int i = 0; i < COLOR_SAMPLES; ++i)
00131                         ret.c[i] = ::Clamp(c[i], low, high);
00132                 return ret;
00133         }
00134         bool IsNaN() const {
00135                 for (int i = 0; i < COLOR_SAMPLES; ++i)
00136                         if (isnan(c[i])) return true;
00137                 return false;
00138         }
00139         void Print(FILE *f) const {
00140                 for (int i = 0; i < COLOR_SAMPLES; ++i)
00141                         fprintf(f, "%f ", c[i]);
00142         }
00143         void XYZ(float xyz[3]) const {
00144                 xyz[0] = xyz[1] = xyz[2] = 0.;
00145                 for (int i = 0; i < COLOR_SAMPLES; ++i) {
00146                         xyz[0] += XWeight[i] * c[i];
00147                         xyz[1] += YWeight[i] * c[i];
00148                         xyz[2] += ZWeight[i] * c[i];
00149                 }
00150         }
00151         float y() const {
00152                 float v = 0.;
00153                 for (int i = 0; i < COLOR_SAMPLES; ++i)
00154                         v += YWeight[i] * c[i];
00155                 return v;
00156         }
00157         bool operator<(const Spectrum &s2) const {
00158                 return y() < s2.y();
00159         }
00160         friend class ParamSet;
00161         
00162         // Spectrum Public Data
00163         static const int CIEstart = 360;
00164         static const int CIEend = 830;
00165         static const int nCIE = CIEend-CIEstart+1;
00166         static const float CIE_X[nCIE];
00167         static const float CIE_Y[nCIE];
00168         static const float CIE_Z[nCIE];
00169 private:
00170         // Spectrum Private Data
00171         float c[COLOR_SAMPLES];
00172         static float XWeight[COLOR_SAMPLES];
00173         static float YWeight[COLOR_SAMPLES];
00174         static float ZWeight[COLOR_SAMPLES];
00175         friend Spectrum FromXYZ(float x, float y, float z);
00176 };
